alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Ware, central Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 332 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Braganza to 8 miles south of Du Pont. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of central Ware, central Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
